title: prepaid card
body: I just bought a 25$ card and seemed to have scratched the numbers too much, I cannot make out the 1st four numbers on the card. I still have a receit. what am i to do?

replies.body: We'd like to look into this with you!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team will help out individually with your case.  We'll respond back asap!
Thanks for the quick response. I sent a ticket.
